ComicInfo.Title: Threat Matrix 3 of 4
ComicInfo.Summary:
THREAT MATRIX! Below the streets and above the high rises of the New York City, the G.I. Joe team is strained to the brink fighting back THE MAD MONK's all-out assault on the Big Apple! But... is that playing right into his hands to ultimately destroy DUKE?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creators | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Steve Kurth (p), Allen Martinez (i) & Joana Lafuente (c) | 1 | RI | Retailer Incentive Cover | Ryan Dunlavey | Missing |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-11 12:34:10. [CVDB431458]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Allen Martinez, Joana Lafuente, Ryan Dunlavey, Steve Kurth
ComicInfo.Characters: Baroness, BATS, Beachhead, COBRA Viper Pilot, Cover Girl, Destro, Doc, Duke, Krake, Mad Monk, Mainframe, Quick-Kick, Roadblock, Scarlett, Shipwreck, Stalker, Tunnel Rat, Zandar, Zarana
ComicInfo.Teams: COBRA, Cobra Soldiers, Dreadnoks, G.I. Joe, M.A.R.S., Vipers
ComicInfo.Locations: Flushing, Queens, Manhattan, New York City, New York State, North America, Scotland
